DBClusterParameterGroupName.description: The name of the DB cluster parameter group to reset.

Parameters.description: A list of parameter names in the DB cluster parameter group to reset to the default values. You cannot use this parameter if the ResetAllParameters parameter is set to true.

ResetAllParameters.description: A value that is set to true to reset all parameters in the DB cluster parameter group to their default values, and false otherwise. You cannot use this parameter if there is a list of parameter names specified for the Parameters parameter.
